structure.unit: LIQUEFIED PETROLEUM GAS AND OTHER FLAMMABLE LIQUIDS

law.catch_line: Request for refund of assessment -- Requirements.
law.text: If the referendum is carried in the affirmative and the assessment is levied and collected as provided, any person upon and against whom the assessment shall have been levied and collected under the provisions of KRS 234.270 to 234.302, if dissatisfied with the assessment and the result thereof, may demand of and shall receive from the council a refund of the assessment collected, if the demand for refund is made in writing within thirty (30) days from the date on which the assessment is collected. Each refund request shall be accompanied by written proof of the assessment charged.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 182, sec. 14, effective July 15, 1998.
